channel.title: 317 blank server
channel.description:
Well, erm.. There are no pictures.. I cba with pictures. Just look for yourself.
4 Files;
[ul][li]Server[/li] [li]ClientHandler[/li] [li]Stream[/li] [li]Cryption[/li][/ul] 7kb when compressed; 29.7kb when not compressed.
Have fun.. Oh and also, not for well, how would you say it.. People that don't have experience of how the RS2 Client and Servers work.
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?eyena6mhytk6l7y]http://www.mediafire.com/?eyena6mhytk6l7y[/url]

item.title: 317 blank server
item.dc:creator: @we_rushed_god we rushed god
item.description:
@we_rushed_god wrote:

Sorry, what? First, you take a look to see what it’s like without pictures, and also when the fuck did I say what base it was and also, what exactly have I fucked up? I’ll think you’ll find I only moved a static inner-class to a main class in a separate file. So, care to explain?

kthxbye.
[/quote]
In the credits, u gave credits to the base and if u just moved a inner class then it wouldnt be blank now would it? and by fucking it up i mean by taking a good private server and deleting all the shit in it so its blank

Read full topic

item.title: 317 blank server
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Pure Demons, post:10, topic:368350”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=464502.msg3396994#msg3396994 date=1289525685]

Enough with the fucking blank sources and shit lawl

Blank sources are good for beginning programmers to work on
I hate idiots who just download a pro source then rename it and give them selves 100% credits

but understand that there are a lot of blank bases for people to use already.

It’s always good when people release new blank bases. I personally find that it takes the RSPS community a step foward.
[/quote]

Not when you take the files from http://www.moparisthebest.com/origrs2/ and put the ClientHandler in a different class…[/quote]
Who cares where it’s taken from? Did you know that some new people that come here wanting to learn do not know about that? I also put the ClientHandler class into a separate file because it’s easier and people obviously are going to want it moved anyhow.

we rushed god:

if its blank y would we need 2 “take a look” and y would u include the “base” u used when u totally fucked it up?

Sorry, what? First, you take a look to see what it’s like without pictures, and also when the fuck did I say what base it was and also, what exactly have I fucked up? I’ll think you’ll find I only moved a static inner-class to a main class in a separate file. So, care to explain?

kthxbye.

Read full topic
